mapper.select: SELECT o.id as oId,u.id as uId,u.realName as realName,u.name as name,u.jobNumber as jobNumber, o.code as code,o.parentId as parentId,o.orgName as orgName,o.his_permission as his_permission,DATE_FORMAT(m.createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s") as createTime FROM organization o inner join user_organization_mapping m on o.id=m.oId INNER JOIN user u on u.id=m.uId WHERE 1 = 1 and o.status = 1 and oId=#{sId} ORDER BY m.createTime DESC
